alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Washington; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 16 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Coastal DownEast, Far Eastern, Far Northern, and Interior DownEast Maine, including the following areas, in Coastal DownEast Maine, Coastal Washington. In Far Eastern Maine, Northern Washington and Southeast Aroostook. In Far Northern Maine, Northeast Aroostook. In Interior DownEast Maine, Central Washington. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - For flood safety visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Washington; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook
